article_title: Breast Is The Best? China Considers Ban On Infant Formula Ads
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: breast, best, china, considers, ban, infant, formula, ads

og.description: China is considering a ban on advertisements for infant milk formula in a bid to tackle low levels of breast feeding.
og.title: China Considers Ban On Infant Formula Ads
